title: FS: American Beauty, Cycle and Tolstoi Backs!!
author: rocarroll

posts.post_title: FS: American Beauty, Cycle and Tolstoi Backs!!
posts.post_content:
Up for sale are Schreck Cycle PSA 2, Herzog Tolstoi PSA 2.5 and Milligan PSA 1.5 American Beauty (mislabeled by PSA as Cycle).  All cards present very well for their grade and I feel could have just as easily been a half grade higher.  Please add $3 for shipping.  If you want all 3 make me an offer and maybe we can make a deal

Sorry for the sideways photos, couldn't get them to rotate

Schreck:  SOLD
Milligan:   SOLD
Herzog:   SOLD

I'll take the Schreck and Milligan

Pm coming
Bump for sale status and price update
